name: api_physics2d_EdgeCollider2D
description: Collider for 2D physics representing an arbitrary set of connected edges (lines) defined by its vertices.

properties.name: adjacentEndPoint
properties.description: Defines the position of a virtual point adjacent to the end point of the EdgeCollider2D.

properties.name: adjacentStartPoint
properties.description: Defines the position of a virtual point adjacent to the start point of the EdgeCollider2D.

properties.name: edgeRadius
properties.description: Controls the radius of all edges created by the collider.

properties.name: points
properties.description: Get or set the points defining multiple continuous edges.

properties.name: useAdjacentEndPoint
properties.description: Set this to true to use the adjacentEndPoint to form the collision normal that is used to calculate

properties.name: useAdjacentStartPoint
properties.description: Set this to true to use the adjacentStartPoint to form the collision normal that is used to calculat

properties.name: GetPoints
properties.description: Gets all the points that define a set of continuous edges.

properties.name: Reset
properties.description: Reset to a single edge consisting of two points.

properties.name: SetPoints
properties.description: Sets all the points that define a set of continuous edges.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindFirstObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves the first active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindObjectsByType
properties.description: Retrieves a list of all loaded objects of Type type.

properties.name: Instantiate
properties.description: Clones the object original and returns the clone.
